title: PullRequest
description: Pull requests associated to a repository within a forge (Gitea, GitLab, etc.).

number.description: Unique identifier, relative to the repository.

poster_id.description: Unique identifier of the user who authored the pull request.

poster_name.description: Name of the user who authored the pull request.

poster_email.description: Email of the user who authored the pull request.

title.description: Short description displayed as the title.

state.description: A 'closed' pull request will not see any activity in the future, otherwise it is 'open'.

is_locked.description: A locked pull request can only be modified by privileged users.

items.description: Name of a user assigned to the issue.

patch_url.description: URL from which the patch of the pull request can be retrieved.

merged.description: True if the pull request was merged.

merged_time.description: The time when the pull request was merged.

merged_commit_sha.description: The SHA of the merge commit.

head.description: The changes proposed in the pull request.

base.description: The branch where the pull request changes in the head are to be merged.
